history.proof: intros a b c d H1 H2. srun best use: Unnamed_thm34, Rplus_comm, Rplus_gt_compat_l, Rge_gt_trans unfold: Rge.

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c, d : R H1 : a + b >= 0 H2 : 0 > d Unable to unify "a + b >= 0" with "a + c > d".

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c, d : R H1 : a + b >= 0 H2 : 0 > d Unable to unify "?M1844 + ?M1846 < ?M1843 + ?M1845" with "b > c \\/ b = c".

original: intros a b c d H1 H2. apply Unnamed_thm37. - apply H1. - apply Rplus_ge_gt_compat. apply Rplus_ge_gt_compat_l with (r2 := c). apply Rplus_ge_gt_compat. apply Rplus_ge_gt_compat_r with (r1 := a). apply Rplus_ge_gt_compat. auto. apply Ropp_0_gt_lt_contravar. auto.
